name: com.ultraleap.tracking
description: Ultraleap's Unity Plugin enables the data produced by Ultraleap tracking hardware to be used by developers inside their Unity projects. It includes various utilities and prefabs that make it as easy as possible to design and use hand tracking in XR projects

samples.description: Shared core example assets for all other Ultraleap Sample content.
XR-focussed examples for head mounted Ultraleap hand tracking cameras and Ultraleap-enabled HMDs.
Tabletop-focussed examples for Desktop and Screentop mounted Ultraleap hand tracking cameras.
Example URP-specific content. Note: Other example content will also work with URP after upgrading materials.
